item.description: Dr. Jakub Rydzewski email: jr@fizyka.umk.pl (0x9C1099DF) wire: @jkrd x: @JakubRydzewski orcid: 0000-0003-4325-4177 arXiv: 0000-0003-4325-4177 scholar: dEMXOpcAAAAJ github: @jakryd Scientific Career 2023-2024 Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) Fellow at the National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology (AIST), Japan, the group of Prof. Tetsuya Morishita. Since 2019 Assistant Professor at the Institute of Physics NCU (Toruń, Poland). 2019 Visiting Professor at the Department of Physics, University of Tsukuba, Japan, the group of Prof.

Patryk Tajs github: Minosyx Education 2022-2024 MSc in Computer Science at the Institue of Physics NCU (Toruń, Poland). Thesis: Stochastic Dimensionality Reduction of Complex Systems Supervisor: Dr. Jakub Rydzewski 2019-2022 BSc Eng in Computer Science at the Institue of Physics NCU (Toruń, Poland). Supervisor: Dr. Jakub Rydzewski
Razil Tahir email: raziltahir@hotmail.com orcid: 0009-0005-6459-7154 Education Since 2019 PhD in Chemistry at University of Malaya, Faculty of Science, Malaysia

Sylwia Czach email: s.czach@doktorant.umk.pl orcid: 0000-0002-1546-1075 arXiv: 0000-0002-1546-1075 scholar: Wo7AmEcAAAAJ Education Since 2020 PhD in Physical Sciences at the Institue of Physics NCU (Toruń, Poland). Supervisors: Dr. Jakub Rydzewski and Prof. Dr. Wiesław Nowak 2017-2020 MSc in Biotechnology at the Institue of Physics NCU (Toruń, Poland). Thesis: Biochemical characterization of phosphatases from Vipera Xanthina venom

Tejas Shah email: tejas.shah@utdallas.edu orcid: 0000-0003-0125-3774 scholar: f5-82KUAAAAJ Education Since 2019 PhD in Chemistry at Department of Chemistry and Biochemistry University of Texas at Dallas

Tuğçe Gökdemir email: tugcegokdemir@doktorant.umk.pl x: @tugcegokdemir orcid: 0000-0002-7475-6797 arXiv: 0000-0002-7475-6797 scholar: hmnFCpcAAAAJ github: @TugceGokdemir Education Since 2023 PhD in Physical Sciences at the Institue of Physics NCU (Toruń, Poland). Supervisors: Dr. Jakub Rydzewski and Prof. Dr. Wiesław Nowak 2020-2022 MSc in Bioengineering at the Adana Alparslan Türkeş Science and Technology University (Adana, Turkey), Thesis: Theoretical Investigation of Mixed Metal Organic Frameworks as H2 Adsorbents
